propDescriptions.size: The size of the component. It accepts theme values between 'sm' and 'lg'. To learn how to add custom sizes to the component, check out Themed componentsâ€”Extend sizes.
propDescriptions.sx: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles. See the `sx` page for more details.

root.description: Class name applied to the root element.

slotDescriptions.root: The component that renders the root.
slotDescriptions.ol: The component that renders the ol.
slotDescriptions.li: The component that renders the li.
slotDescriptions.separator: The component that renders the separator.
